item.title: Hackthebox Shoppy
item.description: Foothold A nmap scan of the top 1000 ports gives us: # Nmap 7.93 scan initiated Fri Sep 23 19:28:02 2022 as: nmap -Pn -sS -A --top-ports 1000 -O -oN nmap_tcp_top_1000.txt -vvvv shoppy.htb Nmap scan report for shoppy.htb (10.10.11.180) Host is up, received user-set (0.047s latency). Scanned at 2022-09-23 19:28:03 WEST for 25s Not shown: 998 closed tcp ports (reset) PORT STATE SERVICE REASON VERSION 22/tcp open ssh syn-ack ttl 63 OpenSSH 8.
